Easy Protein Tree Annotating
============================

Easy Protein Tree Annotating (EPTA) will solve your problem of how to build an informative protein phylogenetic tree easil
to help you to build a protein tree from FASTA files.

Features
--------

- Fetch protein profile from databases automatically
- Run Pfamscan online for protein domain prediction
- Human-readable dataframe for data inspect

Installation
------------

Install (EPTA) by running:

    pip install easyproteintreeannotating
    or
    conda install easyproteintreeannotating
